title: 基里尔·别特连科与王羽佳
short_description: 在这场2018年4月的音乐会中，当选柏林爱乐乐团首席指挥的基里尔·别特连科为我们带来了两部切响浮生的佳作：保罗·杜卡斯的《花仙子》和弗朗茨·施密特伤感的《第四交响曲》。其中，施密特的交响曲颇具布鲁克纳的创作风格，铿锵的葬礼进行曲是全曲的一大亮点；普罗科菲耶夫的《第三钢琴协奏曲》感情饱满、技艺精湛的，由中国钢琴家王羽佳担任钢琴独奏。

concert.title: 基里尔·别特连科与王羽佳

interview.title: 王羽佳对话安德烈斯·奥滕萨摩
interview.description: In the atmospheric Watergate Club in Berlin, Chinese pianist Yuja Wang met with Andreas Ottensamer, principal clarinet with the Berliner Philharmoniker, to mark a concert she gave with the orchestra in April 2018. As we learn in this interview, the artist, who is celebrated worldwide for her virtuosity, has a close relationship with Berlin and she has performed chamber music evenings with members of the Philharmoniker in the city several times. Yuja Wang also discusses Sergei Prokofiev’s Third Piano Concerto which she performed under the direction of the Philharmoniker’s chief conductor designate, Kirill Petrenko.
interview.short_description: 2018年4月，中国钢琴家王羽佳与柏林爱乐乐团合作演绎了普罗科菲耶夫的《第三钢琴协奏曲》。在这段视频中，王羽佳与乐团的单簧管演奏员安德烈斯·奥滕萨摩在河边进行了一次对话。

metadata.title: 王羽佳对话安德烈斯·奥滕萨摩

concert.title: 基里尔·别特连科与王羽佳

interview.title: 基里尔·别特连科对话克努特·韦伯
interview.description: For his second appearance with the Berliner Philharmoniker following his election as chief conductor, Kirill Petrenko programmed works alongside Prokofiev’s Third Piano Concerto, which the orchestra had not performed for more than 50 years: the ballet music La Péri by Paul Dukas, and Franz Schmidt’s Fourth Symphony. Petrenko considers the quality of these compositions undeniable, and explains in this conversation with the Philharmoniker’s cellist and orchestra board member Knut Weber why they still so rarely performed. In addition, the conductor talks about his training when he was young, and the differences between conducting in the opera house and the concert hall.
interview.short_description: 2018年4月，已当选柏林爱乐乐团首席指挥的基里尔·别特连科为他与乐团合作的第二场演出选择了弗朗茨·施密特的《第四交响曲》。在这里，别特连科与柏林爱乐的大提琴演奏员克努特·韦伯进行了一次对话。

metadata.title: 基里尔·别特连科对话克努特·韦伯
